### Palettes

```{r}
# use this script to edit images for readme
library(soilpalettes)
library(imager)


alaquod = load.image("images/hex/alaquod-hex.png") %>% 
  imsub(x %inr% c(0,1600),y %inr% c(850,1100)) %>%
  imrotate(90) %>% save.image("images/hex/alaquod.png")
#png(filename = "images/hex/alaquod.png")
```
